entries.Rainy_Day_0: Hmmm... this weather puts a bit of a damper on my workout plans...$3#$b#Maybe I'll stay inside today and do some free weights$0.#$b#Wouldn't want to catch a cold!$1#$e#What's up with those bedroom eyes, @?$4#$b#Oh? Maybe a trip outside wouldn't be such a bad idea after all...$6#$e#I might never get tired of you admiring my body the way you do, @. I love you so much.$4
entries.Rainy_Day_1: It would be dangerous to lift heavy weights out in the rain, so I figured I'd stay in today.#$b#You know, after my workout, you could always stay inside with me.#$e# My sore muscles could use a massage.$4#$b#Your hands always make my body feel amazing after an intense workout.$4#$b#Just thinking about it is getting me a bit excited... I should get started here so that I can get my reward...$6
entries.Rainy_Day_2: Part of being a bodybuilder is knowing how to cook! I made enough for both of us, if you’d like some. [186 180 770 535]$1#$e#The quality of the crops you grow really helps keep my growing body fueled, by the way. #$b#They’re so packed with vitamins and nutrients!$1#$b#I feel so much more energized after I eat a meal made with something you’ve grown.$13#$b#If You keep growing crops, I’ll keep growing my muscles! Sound like a deal?$1
entries.Rainy_Day_3: I really worry about you going out in the rain... But as a farmer I suppose it can’t be helped.$3#$b#I’d like to stay in if possible, I was thinking of working my core extra hard today.$0#$b#I feel like I might neglect my abs a bit sometimes. I enjoy chest and bicep workouts so much, that I tend to over do them.$13#$b#There is definitely something incredible about a good core workout though.#&b#After you push past the pain it starts to feel really... pleasurable.$6#$b# I’ve heard of ‘coregasms’ but you really have to feel one to understand what it's like.$6#$e#That settles it! I’m going to go all out today, and really blast my belly!$1#$b#I’ll have these abs so hard that you’ll be able to grate cheese on them!$1
entries.Rainy_Day_4: On rainy days like this, I love to practice my posing routine.$13#$e#I used to loath posing, mostly because it was just my mom scolding me to get them right.$12#$b#I didn’t really like the idea of strangers staring at me half-naked on stage, either...$3#$b#But since I moved here to the farm, I’ve started getting really into my posing routine.$1#$b# I’ve even begun to appreciate all of my gains, no matter how minor.$4#$b#Seeing how big, and hard I can get these muscles... $4#$b#It’s begun to really excite me, you know?$6#$b#And knowing that you’ll be coming home, to admire each and every inch of me... That’s the best part of all.$6#$b#...Don’t be late tonight, darling.$6
entries.patio_Penny_0: I'm going to spend today researching new exercises, since it’s a break day and all. I might even try out some new supplements too!$1#$b#You look excited, @!$1#$b#Are you thinking about what I’d look like if I gained even more muscle?$6
entries.patio_Penny_1: %Penny is standing on the patio. The sun light is hitting her perfectly, accentuating all of her rippling muscles perfectly.#$b#%You really are lucky to have such an incredible woman by your side every day.#$b#@, it's just a wonderful day, don't you think?$1
entries.Rainy_Night_0: Oomph! I feel so pumped! I’m more than happy to do that.$6#$e#I feel so safe when you hold me, @. I sleep like a baby every night.$6
entries.Rainy_Night_1: I'm sure Mom's at the saloon right now, now that she doesn’t train me anymore...#$e#She tells me she was a serious bodybuilder back in the day. But after she had me, she put that life behind her.$3#$b# Eventually she started drinking, and it ruined all of her hard work.$5#$b#I think she blames me for it, which is why she was so determined to make me follow in her footsteps.$2#$b#But I’ve spent enough time feeling guilty about my mom. Now it's time to live my own life, on my own terms!$1#$b#...With the person that I love...$4
entries.Rainy_Night_2: I was just thinking about the night we met in the bathhouse.$4#$e#It felt like we were the only two people in the world.$4#$b#You were the first person I genuinely wanted to see all of me...$4#$e#Even though I was terrified that you wouldn’t love me the way I love you... $3#$b#I remember feeling overwhelmingly confident as soon as I saw you... That was a new feeling for me.$4#$b# You were mesmerized by my body... it made me feel so empowered...$6#$b# It was intoxicating.$6#$b#It’s a little embarrassing now, thinking back. I’m wasn't normally a flirty, or seductive person.$4#$b#But you woke something inside of me, I wanted you to see that. And see all of me. $4#$b# It was like I was a different person, I couldn’t get enough of you admiring my body.$6#$b#Do you remember the little show I put on for you? I watched and followed your gaze, and flexed each muscle your eyes reached...$6#$b#I remember the look on your face... you were absolutely transfixed on my chest. I had worked them extra hard that day...$12#$b#I splashed a little water on them. Your eyes went so wide as you watched the water trickle down my swollen pecs, and into my cleavage...$6#$b#Oh... sorry I started to get a bit carried away.$4#$b#We should visit the bathhouse again on our anniversary, and by then I’ll be even more passionate.$4
entries.Rainy_Night_3: I realized recently that listening to the rain really helps me concentrate when I’m working out.$0#$b#I can enter a zen like trance; it's just me and my muscles.$3#$b#It’s gotten to the point where I can even push past the pain a bit more than I could before.$0#b#And that means even bigger, harder muscles for you to admire.$13#$e#I hope it rains again tomorrow...$6
entries.Indoor_Day_0: It's so peaceful here.#$b#I never thought I'd be able to love working out as much as I do now.#$b# But you changed my mind. Now I love my body!$1#$b#And so, I'm going to make it even better, for  me, and for you.$4

Maybe we can stay like this for a bit longer...$7#$b#You have such amazing hands... *moan*...$7#$b#Here, let me take my top off so you can get a better feel...$10#%b#You know, if I keep getting bigger, I might need to inflate these a bit more... Would you like that?$10#$b#*moan*...! Then I'll make them as big as you like! Just don't stop...$10#$b#*moan*...! *moan*...!!$11#$b#Wait! I can't get too worked up! I still haven't finished my workout for today!$8#$b#But maybe after I'm done, you and your magic fingers can pick up where we left off...$6
entries.summer_28: Today's the last day of summer! While I'm not going to miss the heat so much, I think I might have missed my chance to tan.#$b# You like my skin tone just the way it is? You're so sweet, @!$1#$b#Still you can't tell me you wouldn't like to see me, with a nice tan...$4#$b#It would really help these muscles pop. And If I were to say...$4#$b#Slather my newly bronzed body with baby oil, and get all pumped up for you...?$6#$b#Maybe pick up a new posing suit, and let you watch as I...$6#$b#Flex.$6#$b#Every.$6#$b#Single.$6#$b#Muscle.$6#$b#All of it would be just for you...$6#$b# I thought that might get you excited, but my goodness! you're practically drooling!$8#$b#That settles it! Next summer I'm getting a tan. no matter what!$1#$b#Also, thank you for appreciating me, @.$6#$b#And as for that flexing session... maybe we don't have to wait till next year, if you're free tonight?$6
entries.fall_1: Ah... Now that the weather has cooled off, I don't need to worry about the heat slowing me down!$1#$b#Ah! Before you go, I was hoping maybe you could do me a favor?$4#$b#My traps are so tense right now, but I can't really get to them myself.$2#$b#@, could you take a few minutes to give me one of your amazing back rubs? It would make my day do so much better.$4#$b#Thank you!$1#$b# Ahh... that's perfect, just keep kneading right there...$7#$b#*moan*... This is heaven.$6#$b#Ahhh... I feel like a new woman, thank you honey. I feel like I can push my body to one hundred and ten percent now!$1
entries.fall_2: It's my birthday today! How about as a present, you rub my back again tonight?$1#$b#Maybe if you're good, I'll let your hands do some wandering...$4#$b#What's that? You'd rub my back any day? And you're going to get me something amazing as well?$8#$b#You're just the sweetest, @. But honestly, your massages are more than a good enough present for me!$4#$b#I'm going to take my top off now, don't get too distracted back there, *giggle*.$6#$b# *moan*... I can already feel the knots melting away...$11#$b#I'm the luckiest woman in the world. I almost feel guilty hogging you all to myself! But it's my birthday, and you're all mine today...$10#$b#*moan*... I did say you could let your hands wander a bit didn't I? Maybe you'd like to move down a bit?$10#$b#*gasp*! *moan*.... *giggle*!$10#$b#Oh... Oh yes... That feels *pant* so good...$10#$b#I love you so much, @. *pant* The way you move your hands is *moan* incredible...$10#$b#Oh god...! *moan*...! *moan*...!!$11#$b#God... How are you doing this? It's *pant* starting to get really intense...! $11#$b#Yes, *pant* just like that! *moan*!$14#$b#I think *pant* I'm going to cum already! $11#$b# Whatever you do, *pant*don't stop!$14#$b#@! @!!!$15#$b#...*pant* *shiver*$11#$b#... wow.*shiver*$10#$b#...You were incredible. *pant*$10#$b# That was the best birthday present I've ever gotten.*pant*$10#$e#Give me a second... *pant* I'm still basking in the pleasure...$10#$e#I feel so much better thanks to your present, darling. I'm going to be thinking about it all day...$6
entries.fall_4: What do you think about girls who use steroids?$3#$b#Personally I'm against it. It's probably the only thing my mother and I agree about.$3#$b#It's awfully tempting though. All of that muscle, so quickly.$0#$b#But I'd rather do things the right way. Even if it means it's the slow way as well.$1#$b#Plus... I’ve seen the way Haley snaps from time to time.$2#$b#I don't ever want to become like that.$2
entries.fall_5: Fall makes me think of chocolate protein powder... weird, isn't it?$1#$b#Maybe I’ll use a little extra in my shake today...$2#$b#No! My diet is perfectly calculated for maximum effectiveness. I shouldn’t deviate from the plan...$8
entries.fall_8: Winter's just around the corner. Bundling up is tough with this body.#$e#Maybe this year I'll brave the cold in my tank top!$1
entries.fall_15: The garange display should have lots of healthy items!#$e#I know you'll make the right choice though, because you always do.$h#$b#I love you, @.$4
entries.fall_26: Don't let these big muscles fool you, I'm not brave enough to enter the maze at the Spirit's Eve festival tomorrow night...$3#$e#Maybe if you hold my hand, @. I always feel more courageous when I'm with you.$4
entries.winter_1: I don't think wearing my old jacket is a good idea this year.$2#$e#I think my torso would be ok, but my shoulders would never fit.$2#$b#It’s okay! I wouldn't want to cover up all of this hard work anyway!$13
entries.winter_3: I had a dream last night that we got snowed in.$0#$b#We had to snuggle up under a big blanket, with nothing but the heat of our bodies to keep us warm...$4#$b#Things got a little naughty after that...$6#$b#you know, a lot of my dreams about you end up that way, @.$6#$e#I might be hoping for a blizzard this year.$6
entries.winter_5: I love the aesthetic of snow, but it’s hard to deny that it makes exercising outside a lot more of a hassle.$3#$b#Good thing we have a lovely home for me to use!$1#$b#I truly appreciate the life you’ve made for us here, @. Thank you.$4
entries.winter_7: I hope that Hayley doesn’t come to the ice fishing competition...$3#$b#She’s so heavy now that I’m afraid she’d crack the ice...$2#$b#...$3#$b#Hypothetically... How would you feel if I were to get as big as Hayley?$4#$b#I-I mean, I wouldn’t ever consider using any illegal means!$8#$b#But I would be fibbing if I said I don’t fantasize about getting that muscular...$4#$b#Maybe one day I’ll catch up to her. Wouldn’t that be something?$1
entries.winter_12: Winter has a quiet and romantic feel to it, doesn't it? The snow is beautiful...
entries.winter_20: @, Have you ever thought about putting on some muscle?$0#$b#I don't mean to insinuate that you're weak! I also happen to love your body very much just the way it is!$1#$b#It's just, well I had a dream recently that you started joining me for my workouts...$4#$b# Having you there, I felt so much more driven.$4#$b#You were an absolute beast as well...$6#$b#You dominated the gym in only a few sessions. It was really...exciting.$8#$b#You got so big... and so strong...$6#$b#A-anyway, I know the farm is your passion so I won't bring it up again.$0#$b#But you're always welcome to join if you change your mind$6.
entries.winter_24: The gift exchange is tomorrow!$!#$b#Gosh, I can't imagine what I'd even ask for this year. I'm alrady blessd with so much...#$b#My health... A wonderful home... Independance...#$b#And Most of all.... the love of my life.$4
